document.full_text: in 1984, ms. ferraro took her place in american history as the first woman nominated for national office by a major party.
document.title: geraldine a. ferraro, 1935-2011: she ended the men's club of national politics
lines_and_colors: in 1984, ms. ferraro took her place in american history as the first woman nominated for national office by a major party.
